text: 18.22: Ais 24.8; Jer 25.10; Ese 26.1318.22: Jer 7.34; 25.10Maaŋ muuŋgiap, Babiron ŋgu bakɨme, mbe gitagi shogi khɨkhɨɨ gum, gumgi kaathoori khɨkhɨɨ gum, sɨfɨri khɨkhɨɨ gu, mbarɨvi bi khɨkhɨm gu, mbarkɨrga bigir khɨkhɨɨr vhuuiŋ, nta wom ndun bɨnan vhen kegɨp kɨrar hɨrga fhu. Mba mbarkɨrga bigir vhuuiŋ guarira muunga ndɨkndɨgi ki gumgi, mbe wom ndun kɨrga fhu. Mba wit mbɨgi kɨma khɨkhɨm, ana wom ndun vhen kegɨp hɨrga fhu.
